description: Requires that a workspace package is configured with ESLint.

entries.reason: TODO: Add reason why this violation is allowed to be ignored.
entries.error: `eslint-comments/no-unlimited-disable` must be specified as an error in the ESLint configuration, but is specified as off.

entries.reason: TODO: Add reason why this violation is allowed to be ignored.
entries.error: `@typescript-eslint/ban-ts-comment` must be specified as an error in the ESLint configuration, but is specified as off.
